= Introduction =

A class for querying the !WordPress database, including all custom fields using a unified API.

The key function here is [get_posts].  See its dedicated page as well as the page with [Examples of get_posts()get_posts_examples].

----

= Methods =

=== <font color="green">public function count_posts()</font>===

_integer_ *count_posts*(array _$args_ `[`,$ignore_defaults`]`)

 * *$args* : criteria, inputs the same as for `get_posts()`.
 * *OUTPUT*: Integer count of the number of rows meeting the criteria.
